statements: SELECT * FROM employee_certifications;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date, certification_expiry_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date, certification_issuer FROM employee_certifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications WHERE qualification_name = 'Degree';
SELECT DISTINCT certification_number, license_number FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_name = 'AWS Certified Solutions Architect'
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_issuer = 'Microsoft'
SELECT certification_name, certification_date, certification_expiry_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT certification_name, certification_number, certification_issuer FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_number = '12345'
SELECT certification_name, certification_expiry_date, qualification_name FROM employee_certifications WHERE qualification_name = 'Bachelor Degree'
SELECT certification_name FROM certifications WHERE certification_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM certifications ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, employee_id FROM certifications WHERE certification_id IN (2, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certifications WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM licenses WHERE issue_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, employee_id FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY certification_name;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certifications WHERE certification_name LIKE '%Java%';
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 123
SELECT * FROM employee_licenses WHERE license_expiry_date >= '2022-12-31'
SELECT employee_id, qualification_name, qualification_description FROM employee_qualifications ORDER BY qualification_name ASC
SELECT DISTINCT certification_name FROM employee_certifications
SELECT * FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY certification_name DESC;
SELECT qualification_name, qualification_description FROM employee_qualifications WHERE qualification_name LIKE '%software%';
SELECT * FROM employee_licenses WHERE license_expiry_date < '2023-06-01' ORDER BY license_expiry_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE employee_id IN (3, 7, 9)
SELECT * FROM EmployeeCertifications;
SELECT certification_name, issue_date, expiration_date FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT qualification_name, completion_date FROM EmployeeQualifications WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ComplianceDetails WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY last_checked_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, license_name, expiration_date FROM EmployeeLicenses WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE certification_name = 'AWS Certified Solutions Architect'
SELECT employee_id, certification_id, certification_name, issue_date FROM EmployeeCertifications ORDER BY issue_date DESC
SELECT * FROM EmployeeLicenses WHERE issue_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, qualification_id, qualification_name FROM EmployeeQualifications WHERE completion_date < '2021-06-30'
SELECT employee_id, compliance_type, last_checked_date FROM ComplianceDetails WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeCertifications;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date FROM EmployeeCertifications ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name FROM EmployeeCertifications WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT license_name, license_expiry FROM EmployeeLicenses WHERE license_expiry < '2023-06-30';
SELECT qualification_name, qualification_description FROM EmployeeQualifications;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeCertifications;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM EmployeeLicenses;
SELECT qualification_name, qualification_description FROM EmployeeQualifications WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT certification_type_name FROM CertificationTypes WHERE certification_type_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM LicenseTypes ORDER BY license_type_name DESC;
